properties.body:
EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
GOUGH ISLAND.
DNC 01.
M/V GEO SEARCHER 62 PERSONS ON BOARD SINKING AND
CREW ABANDONING SHIP IN 40-14.52S 009-58.12W
AT 151041Z OCT.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC CAPE TOWN,
PHONE: 272 1938 3300, 272 1551 0700,
E-MAIL: MRCC.CT@SAMSA.ORG.ZA, MARITIMERADIO@IXMAIL.CO.ZA,
MARITIMERADIO@TELKOM.CO.ZA.
